title: 5 man team; Bronze
body:
Hi, Hevy here. I'm an all round player but order of preference would be, jungle, adc, mid, supp, top.

Looking for a team . happy to use discord or other types of voip.

Thx,

xheavyreconx

replies.body: would love to play in a team, mainly play adc but decent at jg and top, PatrikkStar
I would be happy to join your team, but the thing is my internet is being a pain so I can only play when it's December. And I go top or jg I mostly go jg
Id be interested, i added you in game
